https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pp0lDaohmhSoOpe3YUCVnh4bpKh.jpg Clarisa is a young woman with family problems. The sudden appearance of a mysterious man immerses her in a new world - that of pornography- where she tries to look for fame to realize her dream of becoming an actress. The disappointment that the experience brings triggers a cathartic process in her, and within her family. Clarisa
